subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski made it through pit stops despite mechanical problems, then grabbed the lead on a restart with eight laps to go and pulled away to win the Nascar Nationwide race at Michigan International Speedway in Brooklyn, Mich.
snippet: Brad Keselowski made it through pit stops despite mechanical problems, then grabbed the lead on a restart with eight laps to go and pulled away to win the Nascar Nationwide race at Michigan International Speedway in Brooklyn, Mich.
